thread.title: K&A Tech Services Unveils Redesigned Website Featuring Managed IT Services, Cloud Solutions and Customized IT Services for Chicago-Area Businesses
thread.title_full: K&A Tech Services Unveils Redesigned Website Featuring Managed IT Services, Cloud Solutions and Customized IT Services for Chicago-Area Businesses - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: K&A Tech Services Unveils Redesigned Website Featuring Managed IT Services, Cloud Solutions and Customized IT Services for Chicago-Area Businesses
text:
New site katechservices.com offers IT services for growing businesses in legal, financial, medical, manufacturing, insurance, real estate, construction, retail, entertainment, hospitality, non-profit, government and education business sectors & industries
CHICAGO, Ill. (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
K&A Tech Services, a managed IT services provider and technology expert for businesses throughout the greater Chicago area, today announced the launch of its new website: http://www.katechservices.com . The company recently turned its text-based site into a new responsive site that addresses its clients’ online information needs for business technology services and solutions. The site includes extensive information about IT services to help clients and prospects better understand K&A’s offerings, including cloud computing solutions and customized services.
The site also displays K&A’s new, cleaner logo and rebranding, along with easier navigation and a refreshed look for a more user-friendly experience.
“Our website has always been an important way for us to share information about the managed IT services we provide businesses throughout the Chicago area,” said Ron Karabowicz, CEO, K&A Tech Services. “The redesigned website has a new look and improved functionality to ensure an easier and more engaging experience for users.”
To learn more about K&A Tech Services and its managed IT services, cloud computing solutions, customized IT services and computer repair services, please visit http://www.katechservices.com .
About K&A Tech Services
K&A Tech Services is a managed IT services provider (MSP) for both small and medium businesses located throughout the Chicago area and its Chicagoland suburbs. As an expert IT manager for businesses across many industries, K&A understands the competitive nature of its clients, making it their mission to keep their clients operating with the most current technology solutions. K&A network engineers learn client business processes to understand their needs and to help extend their vision. A friendly and efficient team is always available to answer all technical questions, while also offering IT services and IT support 24×7 for mission-critical applications. In addition to managed IT services, cloud computing, cloud management and customized IT services, K&A also provides computer repair services to many business sectors and industries, including legal, financial, medical, manufacturing, insurance, real estate, construction, retail, entertainment, hospitality, non-profit, government and education. For more information about K&A Tech Services and its IT services and cloud solutions, visit the company on the web a t http://www.katechservices.com . To learn more now, call 630.879.1360. To get the latest industry news and trends, go to http://www.katechservices.com/category/blog/ .
